selections.name: Dinkum

selections.name: Koekkoek (gb)
selections.reason: European import with D'Amato/Fresu connection; unknown ceiling but fits on class.

danger_horse.name: Charlie's Curlin
danger_horse.reason: Trouble line in last race often signals a rebound performance at better odds.

danger_horse.name: Princess Midnight
